comment.author: 44449193@N05
comment._content:
I have visited the Chateau on numerous occasions, and some activity is definitely present, and makes itself known.  I am a psychic and as well my daughter, we both felt the presence.  However, there is more than 1 presence,  one being a woman which I felt the energy chest area difficult breathing as it was that heavy and she clearly does not want anyone present, she is upset but not demonic.  She feels invaded, not respected and she has not  had closure as to what occured there back then.   As to the other presence there are 2 males that feel to be quite cordial :)

Saffire
